Name: Cloud Meadow
About the game: Congratulations, you're finally a Frontiersman! You're being sent on a special assignment- to venture out into the wild unknown and aid a diverse community of colorful characters. You must establish a farm, breed your colleagues, and foster a healthy social life! Not everything is sunshine and rainbows though, poachers are disturbing the natural ecosystem of the frontiers you have sworn to protect. Team up with your monsterfolk friends to fight back those who seek to exploit the land on behalf of their own greed. Equal parts farming simulator, RPG, & narrative driven adventure, there's always something new around the corner! Here are just a few of the things you can do in Cloud Meadow! Cultivate A Cozy Farm- plant seeds, grow crops, take charge of your personal homestead! Battle Baddies- engage in satisfying hybrid active-turn-based RPG battles! Sexual Shenanigans- breed and bond with your colleagues! Over 50 animated sex scenes! Crafting & Customization- cooking, party customization, farm upgrades!
